reviews.text: One star only on account of this station using APCOA for its parking management. APCOA have cheated me twice previously when I bought parking tickets. Be aware - take images of your vehicle and your ticket, and carefully note arrival and departure times with proof if possible.
As train stations go not bad. Nice Spa. Good Bar and Bistro. DJs every Friday and Saturday. dress up

No ticket machine, which is incredibly annoying - can't collect pre-booked tickets from the station, and  GWR don't seem to support mobile tickets on this route. So to use Kingham, either do it on the day (turn up, queue for tickets, pay full fare...), book ages in advance and pay to get tickets posted to you, or book in advance and collect tickets from a station with a ticket machine. Frustrating.
Accidentally ran and fell down the stairs. Lesson learnt.
Actually after arriving the train from oxford, the bus scheduled have to leave. But sometimes it happened the bus's gone before arriving your train.
